questions.requete_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves FROM eleve e JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve WHERE ie.Annuler = 0
questions.description: Compte le nombre total d'élèves inscrits
